item.title: How can we measure everyday exposure to greenspaces?
item.description: How can we estimate exposure to the natural environment day-to-day?

item.title: Mapping Green Space and Traffic in Glasgow
item.description: The question, in relation to theories of how the quality of greenspace can affect relationships with health, was: Do traffic events occur close to greenspaces? How does this vary spatially and temporally? How can this be visualised? Here is the final result: First load the packages: # allows r to work with spatial data library(rgdal) # allows r to connect with google apis library(googleway) # allows r to perform GIS operations (on vectors especially?
